Package fr.sii.ogham.spring.template.thymeleaf

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContextMerger
    Add additional variables to an existing context.
    StaticVariablesProvider
    Spring AbstractThymeleafView allows to provide static variables.
    TemplateEngineSupplier
    Provides an instance of a TemplateEngine to be used in Spring context.
    ThymeleafEvaluationContextProvider
    Provides evaluation context to be used in SpEL expressions.
    ThymeleafRequestContextWrapper
    This aim of this interface is to be able to handle different versions of Thymeleaf in a Spring context.
    ThymeleafWebContextProvider
    Generate an instance of a Thymeleaf IContext that is suitable in a Web application.
    WebContextProvider
    Provides access to HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse and ServletContext.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RequestContextHolderWebContextProvider
    Implementation that retrieves the current HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse using RequestContextHolder.
    SpringStandaloneThymeleafContextConverter
    Specific context converter for Spring that registers static variables and EvaluationContext for SpEL expressions.
    SpringWebThymeleafContextConverter
    Specific context converter for Spring that registers static variables and EvaluationContext for SpEL expressions.
